Coop

A Rails app to manage and administer housing Co-ops.

A Rails app to manage and administer housing Co-ops.

A website and admin tool to take the stress out of managing Housing Coops. Check out the app but drop us a line first for a log in. The code for this Open Source project is available on GitHub. We're always up for writing new features and customzing to your needs, just let us know what you need.
